caption.p: Dialysis recoveries of MAO-B inhibition by MO1 (A) and AChE inhibition by MO5 and MO9 (B). The concentrations of the inhibitors used were approximately 2 × IC 50 values: MO1, 0.06 µM; MO5, 12.0 µM; MO9, 24.0 µM; lazabemide, 0.12 µM; pargyline, 0.06 µM; and tacrine, 0.54 µM (tacrine was used as a reference reversible inhibitor). For recovery experiments, preincubated enzyme mixtures were dialysed as described in the text.
